TopicTitle: My Spaceplaneship falls apart right ant launch

Articles.Content:
So my spaceship that is built in the spaceplane hanger with B9 airspace HX parts always falls apart. There are struts but it still clips through and falls underground 

[here is a video about my problem](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lYa6EpeBdy0&feature=youtu.be)

Moved to modded support, where you might get faster help.

Welcome to the forums! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Cheers,

~Claw
Your ship is clipping out of the SPH, first fix that to see if it fixes your problem. To do that, select the translation widget (press 2), click the root part and reset the translation with spacebar.
okay thanks i will try that but how do i select the translation widget i infer that means a tool to move something with but i don't know what that is
ohhh I know what you mean no that's not the problem i have a mod that allows that the hanger extender mod is this a known glitch with that mod

Okey i found out what my issue really is its still not solved but the cockpit just falls off and clips through the ship also no it was not the outside of the SPH thing that is not an issue also this only happens when i use the HX parts in B9 aerospace
Is this with any cockpit? Have you tried putting another part below (either from the same mod or stock) the cockpit or some strutting? I know this is not a solution, but could be a workaround hack.

Yes I tried that off cam and it still did not wirk actualy it worked for the other three cockpits I tried but they never had the glitch only the one that was the source also I got a reply from someone on my comment section that said to find the most updated version i cant find that so maybey you could give me a link i can only find .... from october 2014
